bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Service Conditions for Power System Communication Equipment
IEEE Standard Service Conditions for Power System Communication Equipment

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This is a revision of a standard for the usual and unusual service conditions for power system communication equipment. It is similar to service conditions for relays, automatic station supervisory control, and telemetering equipment with which this communication equipment is used. IEEE Std 97-1969, IEEE Recommended Practice for Specifying Service Conditions in Electrical Standards, has been considered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: IEEE Std 281-1984 Revision of IEEE Std 281-1968 IEEE Standard Service Conditions for Power System Communication Equipment
